pages.text: Redbone Coonhounds were originally bred as hunting dogs, particularly raccoons. Though they were also used to hunt bears, boar, and other creatures.$(br2)Standing at roughly a block tall, these loyal dogs come in three different coats.
These dogs are found most commonly in various taiga biomes. They can also be found in old growth birch forests and more rarely in dark forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Bacon Treat.
